title: Check out these views! You'll love this location and this 1 bd 1 ba!
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 1 / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 886 sq ft', 'Rent: $1710 - $1730/Month', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'The Covington is in a great location near popular attractions and with easy access to I-494, Hwy 5 & public transportation.', "We're just 13 miles south of Minneapolis and 22 miles southwest of St. Paul.", "Take a ten-minute stroll and you'll be at the Normandale Lake Bandshell, which holds fun outdoor concerts and events.", "If you're more into cultural activities, check out the nearby Bloomington Center for the Arts where you'll find theaters, art galleries, art classrooms and more.", 'Like the water?', 'Bush Lake Beach is the perfect spot for canoeing, swimming, exploring trails or just laying out on the sand.', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '● 9 Foot Ceilings', '● Air Conditioning', '● Floor to Ceiling Windows', '● Kitchen Island', '● Microwave', '● Plank Flooring', '● Sliding Glass Doors', '● Smoke Free', '● Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '● Walk-In Closets', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● Bike Storage', '● Business Center', '● Cardio Machines', '● Disposal Chutes', '● Fire Pits', '● Online Payments', '● Pond', '● Pool', '● Rooftop Lounge', '● Weight Machines', '● 24-Hour Fitness Center', '● Barbecue/Grill Area', '● Corporate Suites', '● Kingsley Excellence Award', '● Maintenance on Site', '● Pet Washing Station', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Reservable Clubhouse', '● Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '● Yoga Classes Offered', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Mon - Thu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Fri - Sat: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '1D242E293A9B479']
